youMove.title: YOU MOVE!
youMove.subtitle: Analyze the position and pick the side you want to play. One side is winning - but which one?

finish-him.title: Finish Him
finish-him.content: First solve a tactical puzzle, then prove your advantage in the endgame against your chosen engine. Skill Points are awarded for wins and equal the sum of material on the board (‚ôü=1, ‚ôû‚ôù=3, ‚ôú=5, ‚ôõ=9). Draws and losses give no points. Completion time is also recorded for leaderboards.

tornado.title: Tornado
tornado.content: Four time controls available: 1+1, 3+2, 5+3, and 10+5 (separate rating in each). Solve as many puzzles as possible within the time limit. Rating calculated using the Glicko2 system based on puzzle difficulty and time spent. Each solved puzzle awards 1 Skill Point.

topFinishHim.title: Finish Him Records
topFinishHim.content: Player rankings by points earned in the 'Finish Him' mode. Points are awarded for each successfully completed task. You can switch between themes to see the leaders in each category.

theoryLeaderboard.title: Theory Records
theoryLeaderboard.content: Player rankings by points earned in theoretical endgames. You can switch between themes to see the leaders in each category.

overallSkill.title: Overall Skill Rating
overallSkill.content: Total Skill Points earned across all game modes for the selected period: week, 14 days, 21 days, or month. Skill Points equal the material sum (‚ôü=1, ‚ôû‚ôù=3, ‚ôú=5, ‚ôõ=9) in Finish Him mode. In Tornado mode, each puzzle awards 1 point. Only wins count.

skillStreak.title: Daily Streak Rating
skillStreak.content: Tracks players who earn at least 100 Skill Points every consecutive day in any mode. Rating based on the number of consecutive days. Missing a day resets the streak. This encourages regular activity and consistent improvement.

skillStreakMega.title: Tornado +300 Every Day
skillStreakMega.content: For the absolute elite: a streak of earning at least 300 Skill Points in Tornado mode daily. Shows the most dedicated and disciplined players. Missing a day in the mode resets the streak.

topToday.title: Top Today
topToday.content: Shows players who earned the most Skill Points during today. The rating resets daily at midnight.

tornadoLeaderboard.title: Tornado Rating
tornadoLeaderboard.content: Ranks players by their highest rating achieved in Tornado mode. Rating calculated using the Glicko2 system based on solved puzzle difficulty and time spent.

intro.p1: Welcome to the information page about our future subscription system. The application is currently in open testing mode.
intro.p2: During testing, your account is replenished every hour so you can explore all features for free. After this phase, a daily account replenishment system will be introduced based on your subscription.

bonusInfo.title: üéâ Updated Subscription Bonus Tiers!
bonusInfo.p2: We have updated the terms for automatic bonuses for the most active club players.
bonusInfo.p3: Now you can get a premium tier for free ‚Äî just by playing in team tournaments üèÜ
bonusInfo.p4: Every day, the system analyzes your activity over the last 30 days (tournaments, points, and games) and awards activity points.
bonusInfo.p5: Depending on the amount, one of the tiers is assigned:
bonusInfo.p6: ‚ú® The tier is recalculated automatically and may change depending on your activity.
bonusInfo.p7: No applications needed ‚Äî just play, and the system will do everything itself ‚úÖ
bonusInfo.p8: Thank you for supporting the club ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ôü

insufficientCoins.subMessage: You can learn more about how to top up your balance on the pricing page.

about.title: Chessboard.fun
about.intro: is an interactive web platform for chess enthusiasts, offering unique training modes, detailed statistics, and powerful analysis tools.

modes.conversion: A unique mode where you first solve a tactical puzzle and then must prove your advantage in the endgame by playing against the Stockfish engine.
modes.automaticTacticalTrainer: Unlike standard trainers, our smart system turns puzzle-solving into a personalized path to mastery. It analyzes your profile across 25 tactical themes (fork, pin, discovered attack, etc.), identifies your weakest areas, and automatically selects the puzzle that will benefit you the most right now. After each answer, your rating for that theme is instantly updated, ensuring the next puzzle perfectly matches your current skill level.
modes.botSelectionIntro: On our platform, you can choose from several chess bots for training:
modes.userCabinet: Your personal dashboard with statistics for all game modes and a list of your favorite puzzles.
modes.analysisPanel: A powerful tool for analyzing any position with the Stockfish engine, viewing variations, and PGN.

features.lichessIntegration: Log in via your Lichess account and use your profile.
features.advancedStats: Track your tactical and FinishHim ratings, number of games played, FunCoins, and more.
features.puzzleDatabase: All puzzles in the application are based on the vast and high-quality Lichess puzzle database:
features.modernUI: A clean, responsive, and intuitive interface built with TypeScript and Vue.js.
features.localization: Support for English, German and Russian languages.

techStack.backendStack: n8n.io + Nest.js (for webhook processing and API)

about.contributing: We welcome all contributions to the project! If you have ideas, suggestions, or have found a bug, please create an `issue` or a `pull request`.

licenseAndAcknowledgements.gplIntro: This project is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0.

stockfish.title: Stockfish Chess Engine
stockfish.text1: Game and move analysis in this application is powered by
stockfish.text2: , an open-source chess engine distributed under the
stockfish.gplNoteTitle: Important Note on the GPLv3 License:
stockfish.gplNote: The use of a library under the GPLv3 license requires us to make the source code of our own project open and available under the same or a compatible license.
stockfish.projectSourceCode: Project Source Code: Available in this repository
stockfish.licenseText: You can read the full text of the GPLv3 license here:
stockfish.gratitude: We extend our deepest gratitude to the Stockfish team for their incredible work.

maia.title: Maia Chess Engine
maia.text: Human-like moves on the server are provided by **Maia Chess**, a project designed to play chess like a human. Maia uses neural networks trained on millions of human games to predict the moves a player at a specific rating level would make. We are grateful to the Maia team for their innovative approach to creating chess engines.

lcZero.title: Leela Chess Zero (LCZero)
lcZero.text: To run Maia Chess neural network weights, the server uses the **Leela Chess Zero** engine, another powerful open-source neural network chess engine. Many thanks to the Leela Chess Zero community for this incredible project.

chessground.title: Chessground
chessground.text1: The interactive chessboard is rendered using the
chessground.text2: library from the Lichess team, which is distributed under the **GPLv3 License**.
chessground.gratitude: Thank you to Lichess for this wonderful tool.

chessops.title: Chessops
chessops.text: All core chess logic, such as move generation, legality checks, and handling of FEN/PGN formats, is implemented using the **Chessops** library. It is a modern, modular, and efficient library created by the Lichess team.
chessops.gratitude: Thank you to the Lichess team for this reliable library.

credits.lichess: Lichess - for the amazing API and open puzzle database.
credits.n8n: n8n.io - for the flexible automation platform that forms the core of the backend.
credits.community: All contributors and the chess community for their support and feedback.

author.title: A few words from the author
author.bioPart1: Hello! My name is Moser. I was born in 1985 in Kazakhstan and have been living in Germany since 2003.
author.bioPart2: By trade, I'm a mechanical engineer, but I've been passionate about chess my whole life. This project is a long-held dream of mine to create a convenient training tool, which became possible thanks to modern technologies like AI and the n8n platform.
author.bioPart3: I am fluent in Russian and German, and also know some English. Thank you for using Chessboard.fun!

about.footerNote: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for chess enthusiasts everywhere
